page.title: 09MR.BETTERIDGE; GAME KEEPER.
page.content: { MR BETTERIDGE}IS SIR JOHN WILLS' GAME KEEPER.MR.BETTERIDGE ENJOYS HIS WORK BUT TO HIM IT IS MORE A WAY OF LIFE THAN A JOB.HE LOOKS AFTER THE {PHEASANTS}THAT HE REARS HIMSELF.IT COSTS Â£13 TO REAR,SHOOT AND SELL A PHEASANT. HE DOES NOT CARRY A GUN ALTHOUGH HE HAS TROUBLE WITH{POACHERS. MOST POACHERS ARE THOSE WHO STOP THEIR CAR AND SHOOT THE PHEASANTS FROM THE CAR WINDOW. MR.BETTERIDGE KEEPS ABOUT 5,500 ACRES OF LAND.THERE ARE LOTS CROWS, ROOKS AND FOXES IN HIS AREA WHICH HE REGARDS AS{VERMIN}BECAUSE THEY ARE BAD FOR THE PHEASANTS.MR BETTERIDGE WORKS ALL DAY WHEN HE HAS TO BUT ON AVERAGE HE WORKS TEN HOURS A DAY.HIS WORK IS EASIER IN THE WINTER BECAUSE THERE IS LESS FOR HIM TO DO. MR. BETTERIDGE SAYS,YOU CAN WORK ONE HUNDRED YEARS AT GAMEKEEPING AND STILL NOT KNOW IT ALL!
